personalInfo.name: Julian Salinas Rojas
personalInfo.profile: Software Engineer with +7 years building solutions using the .NET and SQL Server. Highly experienced with financial and health insurance companies by collaborating with stakeholders to translate their requirements into technical specifications.

highlights: Collaborated with stakeholders to define requirements, build estimates, and plan implementations, helping them prioritize their business needs.
Built and maintained RESTful APIs in .NET with secure authentication, logging, and unit-tests, increasing system reliability.
Designed and normalized SQL Server databases, reducing redundancy, improving data integrity, consistency, maintainability and query performance.
Run business reports with SSRS and Power BI, enabling financial and operational analysis.
Created ETL pipelines with SSIS to ingest, transform, reconcile data from third-party systems, automating processes and ensuring data integrity.

Integrated third party APIs from Freshdesk, Jotforms, and Acrobat Sign by using Power Automate, and custom code-based solutions, expanding the system capabilities and reducing manual effort for internal teams.
Migrated legacy VB.NET and .NET Framework systems to modern architectures and well stablished technologies reducing technical debt and longâ€‘term maintenance costs.
Developed front-end solutions with Windows Forms, Angular, and Blazor, facilitating the stakeholders to execute their workflows.
Implemented real-time features using SignalR and MassTransit, enabling instant notifications and improving the user experience.
Developed reusable internal .NET libraries, accelerating development of new projects and improving team productivity.
Configured Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines, enabling faster and more reliable releases.
Produced technical documentation, user manuals, and flow diagrams with Microsoft Visio, empowering non-technical stakeholders to operate and improve the system workflows.
Refactored and stabilized AI-assisted codebases, reducing production issues and improving long-term maintainability.
Leveraged AI-assisted development tools to reduce time spent on repetitive and boilerplate coding, allowing greater focus on system design and business logic.
Migrated legacy internal systems to .NET, Angular, and Ionic, reducing technical debt, contributing to the organization's modernization strategy and improving system scalability and maintainability.
Designed, planned, and refined user stories with the stakeholders to improve systems like "Banca Móvil", and "Punto BP"
Built new system features and mobile application modules with .NET, .NET Framework, and Ionic based on specific customer's specifications, supporting critical transactions.
Created SSIS ETL pipelines to automate data ingestion and transformation, enabling reliable and timely financial and operational reporting.
Reduced the number of issues in the app Banca Móvil by 90% after a remake released in 2020.
Authored financial reports with SSRS, enabling transactional analysis for closure and reconciliation.
Actively participated in SCRUM ceremonies and promoted the usage of Azure DevOps for team collaboration.
Contributed in technical evaluations for government tenders, helping the company secure new public-sector projects.
Translated complex requirements into modular, maintainable software using a Waterfall methodology.
Delivered a centralized information system using Java, PrimeFaces, and WebLogic, improving data accessibility and operational efficiency.
Participated as speaker and trainer for non-technical stakeholders during the last stages of the project, facilitating successful system adoption.

Conducted research and developed an Android proof of concept leveraging NFC to read credit card data, enabling mobile point-of-sale capabilities and exploring new business opportunities in financial services.
Delivered contracted features for Banco Popular using Ionic and .NET Framework.
Delivered a second version of the app using Flutter (Dart) and Firebase in 2020, modernizing the codebase and improving maintainability.
Provided maintenance, ensuring compatibility with new OS releases in 2022.
Developed an Android application for the "Encuentro de Estadí­stica (EDEPA)", improving event communication and participant engagement.
Participated in the full Software Development Life Cycle, from requirements gathering to deployment and maintenance.
Oversaw the graphical design with Material Design Principles.
Built Android Native application with the help of Java, Firebase Realtime Database and Cloudinary and deployed to the Google Play Console.
